title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. VI, pt. 619 - Applicability Of Regulations And Statutes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. VI, pt. 619 - Applicability Of Regulations And Statutes

State Regulations
§ 619.1 - Petition for declaratory ruling
§ 619.2 - Issuance of declaratory ruling
§ 619.3 - Grounds for declining to issue a declaratory ruling
§ 619.4 - Overlapping regulations; compliance determinations

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. VI, pt. 619

Statutory authority: State Administrative Procedure Act, §§ 204, 206

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
